#Clasificación.

```{r echo = FALSE}
  
    sahd <- read.table("./data/SAHD", sep=",",head=T, row.names = 1)
    summary(sahd)
    
    train <- sample(nrow(sahd), 0.7*nrow(sahd))
    sahd.train <- sahd[train,]
    sahd.test <- sahd[-train,]

    attach(sahd)
    pairs(~ shp + tobacco + ldl + adiposity + famhist + typea + obesity + alcohol + age + chd, data= sahd)
    
    
```
